name: Purslane, Peach, and Onion Salad
description: [Photograph: Gluten Free Girl] This salad comes courtesy of Jon Rowley, who says, "Nothing could be simpler. Three ingredients: wild purslane, sweet onion, a juicy Frog Hollow peach, and salt and pepper. I have made this with tomatoes and loved...

recipeInstructions.text: Toss ingredients in a bowl and serve.
